title: Marville Volume 1 TPB
description: Marvel's President Bill Jemas takes aim at comics' most controversial personalities personalities along with both real and fictional characters. Marville introduces a new teen character to the Marvel Universe and follows him on his epic journey through time. From comic books to the creation of the universe itself, nothing is safe from the stinging wit and wisdom of Marville. Collecting Marville #1-6, written by Bill Jemas (Ultimate Spider-Man) and illustrated by Mark Bright (Black Panther).
author: Bill Jemas
